lead_paragraph: ORESMAN--Donald. The Council of the Grolier Club is deeply saddened to learn of the death of fellow member and former Councilor Donald Oresman. A Grolier member since 1972, Oresman rendered distinguished service to the Grolier Club during his term as Councilor (1996 to 2005), serving as Vice-President (2002-2005) and Secretary (1998-2001), and chairing our Library, House, Modern Fine Printing, and Prints Committees. He gave generously of his time, energy, and his broad knowledge of books and prints, to the Club's great and lasting benefit; and his counsel will be sorely missed. We extend our sympathy to his wife Patricia, their family, and to his many friends and colleagues in the Grolier Club and the world of books at large. G. Scott Clemons, President 1/3
